short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extention for Satisfactory Calculator that checks recipes you unlocked so you don't have to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load your unlocked recipes from Satisfactory Interactive Map and use the easily on Satisfactory Calculator.
